name: Rabbit Hole (eliperalta)
description:
Music by James Calocerinos

Click to jump and escape the hole. Eat the carrots but don't hit the rocks!

This game is also played with an alternative controller that makes the player feel how much the bunny may have endure to get out. The journey to getting out of a rut comes with small accomplishments. The journey also makes you experience sharp painful hits that may set you so far back that you have to start again.

When you start again you will be physically tired from the last turn you played so it is harder to keep going.

Good. Thats life.
